metaDescription: Claim your name, symbol and other information.
heading: Claim Token Ownership

form.heading: Claim your token info
form.content: Claim your Name and add other information related to your Near Token by filling in the form below. For each edit request, we will ask for a {{amount}} Ⓝ deposit to prove your ownership. You should transfer from the wallet address - {{address}} to claim your ownership

info.label: Deposit {{amount}} Ⓝ to the following address to prove your ownership:
info.tooltip: The sending address must be identical to the address you wish to add information to.

form.successMessage: Thank you, we will review your application and list it after its been approved
